block.p: ABELSON--Sandy. My teenage buddy. I was privileged to have you as a friend. Morty Howard
$(6$)ABELSON--Sandy. Close friend, caring pal, always there. Thanks for the friendship. Joan and Bob Ellis

$(6$)ABELSON--Sanford. Sandy, you were one in a million! We will never forget your warmth, your sweetness, your humor, your singing and your friendship. We loved you and now a lifetime of wonderful memories will keep you with us forever. Lorraine, Richard and Margie
